Sentencas: The internal reforming of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is investigated and modeled for flow conditions relevant to operation.
Titulo: Kinetics of (reversible) internal reforming of methane in solid oxide fuel cells under stationary and APU conditions

Sentencas: In this way, operating conditions for both stationary applications (methane-rich pre-reformate) as well as for auxiliary power unit (APU) applications (diesel-POX reformate) are represented.
Titulo: Kinetics of (reversible) internal reforming of methane in solid oxide fuel cells under stationary and APU conditions

Sentencas: The reforming reaction is monitored in five different positions alongside the anodic gas channel by means of gas chromatography.
Titulo: Kinetics of (reversible) internal reforming of methane in solid oxide fuel cells under stationary and APU conditions

Sentencas: It is shown that methane is converted in the flow field for methane-rich gas compositions, whereas under operation with diesel reformate the direction of the reaction is reversed for temperatures below 675 degrees C, i.e. (exothermic) methanation occurs along the anode.
Titulo: Kinetics of (reversible) internal reforming of methane in solid oxide fuel cells under stationary and APU conditions

Sentencas: Using a reaction model, a rate equation for reforming could be derived which is also valid in the case of methanation.
Titulo: Kinetics of (reversible) internal reforming of methane in solid oxide fuel cells under stationary and APU conditions

Sentencas: By introducing this equation into the reaction model the methane conversion along a catalytically active Ni-YSZ cermet SOFC anode can be simulated for the operating conditions specified above.
Titulo: Kinetics of (reversible) internal reforming of methane in solid oxide fuel cells under stationary and APU conditions
